H0.text: Balance is the tool a student should use to see patterns on a small object.

H1.text: A hand lens is the tool a student should use to see the patterns on a small object.

H2.text: Thermometer is the tool a student should use to see the patterns on a small object.

H3.text: A graduated cylinder is the tool a student should use to see the patterns on a small object.

A4.text: A magnifying glass is a convex lens—usually mounted in a frame with a handle—that is used to produce a magnified image of an object.

A5.text: Magnifying glasses typically have low magnifying power: 2×–6×, with lower magnification providing a wider lens and larger field of view.
